name: Hildra Wool Jumper
description: Knitted jumper with ruffels. The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulder and ruffles decorating the sleeves.
full_text: Knitted jumper with ruffels. The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulder and ruffles decorating the sleeves. WORK OVERVIEW: · The work is knitted from the top down with a saddle shoulder. · The neckline and the yoke are worked in the round on a circular needle. · Stitches are increased for the saddle shoulder, then for the sleeves, and finally for the yoke. · The yoke is divided into front and back piece and sleeves. · The front and back piece are worked in the round on the circular needle from the top down. · The sleeves are worked in the round on double pointed needles or a short circular needle from the top down. SIZES AVAILABLE: (XS-XXXL) XS-S-M-L-XL-XXL-XXXL MEASUREMENTS: Total length: 50-52-53-54-57½-58½-60½cm Sleeve length: 41-42-43-44-45-46-47cm Chest width: 42-44½-48-52-59-64-68cm NEEDLES: Circular needles nr. 2.5: 40cm(or Double pointed needles) Circular needles nr. 3.5: 40cm/80cm YARN: TRYSIL GARN Superwash Ullgarn - Turkis/blå multi (500-500-550-600-650-750-800g)
